about.description:
diffoscope will try to get to the bottom of what makes files or directories
different. It will recursively unpack archives of many kinds and transform
various binary formats into more human readable form to compare them. It can
compare two tarballs, ISO images, or PDF just as easily.
about.summary: in-depth comparison of files, archives, and directories

commands:
coverage run -m \
  --source=diffoscope \
  --branch \
  pytest -vv \
  --tb=long \
  --color=yes \
  -k="not ( \
    assert_non_existing or \
    test_berkeley_db or \
    test_code_is_black_clean or \
    test_elf or \
    test_icc or \
    test_item_rdb or \
    test_macho or \
    test_rlib or \
    test_wasm or \
    test_docx or \
    (test_pdf and test_no_differences) or \
    (test_html and test_diff) \
  )"

about.description:
diffoscope will try to get to the bottom of what makes files or directories

compare two tarballs, ISO images, or PDF just as easily.
about.summary: in-depth comparison of files, archives, and directories

commands:
coverage run -m \

  --branch \

  -k="not ( \

name: diffoscope-split
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "261" %}

{% set min_python = "python >=3.7" %}

# handle undefined PYTHON in `noarch: generic` outputs
{% if PYTHON is not defined %}{% set PYTHON = "$PYTHON" %}{% endif %}

package:
  name: diffoscope-split
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/d/diffoscope/diffoscope-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 51627b37b13be66f45eb2a98ca628b3465ff981ac9e1867e65e131fa04200b92

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python

requirements:
  host:
    - {{ min_python }}
  run:
    - {{ min_python }}

test:
  commands:
    - echo "tests in subpackages"

outputs:
  - name: diffoscope
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv --no-build-isolation
      entry_points:
        - diffoscope = diffoscope.main:main
    requirements:
      host:
        - {{ min_python }}
        - pip
      run:
        - {{ min_python }}
        - python-libarchive-c
        - python-magic
    test:
      imports:
        - diffoscope
      requires:
        - pip
      commands:
        - python -m pip check
        - diffoscope --version | grep {{ version }}
        - diffoscope --help
        - diffoscope --list-tools
        - diffoscope --list-missing-tools

  - name: diffoscope-all-tools
    build:
      noarch: generic
    requirements:
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("diffoscope", max_pin="x.x") }}
        - argcomplete
        - binutils
        - binwalk
        - bzip2
        - cctools
        - defusedxml
        - docx2txt
        - e2fsprogs
        - ffmpeg
        - fonttools
        - gettext
        - ghc
        - giflib
        - gnupg
        - h5py
        - hdf5
        - html2text
        - imagemagick
        - jsondiff
        - libdb
        - llvmdev
        - lzip
        - mono
        - ocaml
        - openjdk
        - openssh
        - pdfminer.six
        - poppler
        - postgresql
        - progressbar
        - pycryptodome
        - pypdf
        - python-debian
        - python-tlsh
        - r
        - rpm-tools
        # - sng  TODO: investigate issues, might be also missing other tools to pass tests
        - squashfs-tools
        - unzip
        - vim
        - wabt
        - zip
    test:
      source_files:
        - tests
      requires:
        # pip check
        - pip
        # real test deps
        - file
        - pytest
        # test extras
        - coverage
      commands:
        - python -m pip check
        - diffoscope --list-missing-tools
        - |-
          coverage run -m \
            --source=diffoscope \
            --branch \
            pytest -vv \
            --tb=long \
            --color=yes \
            -k="not ( \
              assert_non_existing or \
              test_berkeley_db or \
              test_code_is_black_clean or \
              test_elf or \
              test_icc or \
              test_item_rdb or \
              test_macho or \
              test_rlib or \
              test_wasm or \
              test_docx or \
              (test_pdf and test_no_differences) or \
              (test_html and test_diff) \
            )"
        - coverage report --show-missing --skip-covered --fail-under=75

about:
  home: https://diffoscope.org
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  summary: in-depth comparison of files, archives, and directories
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: COPYING
  description: |-
    diffoscope will try to get to the bottom of what makes files or directories
    different. It will recursively unpack archives of many kinds and transform
    various binary formats into more human readable form to compare them. It can
    compare two tarballs, ISO images, or PDF just as easily.
  dev_url: https://salsa.debian.org/reproducible-builds/diffoscope

extra:
  feedstock-name: diffoscope
  recipe-maintainers:
    - bollwyvl
